class Palette
extends OSLib, IDisposable

this Object is automatically created by the context in case of indexed color mode.

ANYWAY IT DOESN'T WORK YET
If anyone has idea, I given up. BTW they should be automatically created and accessed from Palette "aware" OpenGLContext
